quotes.quote: Bomb Macarons! She did an amazing job, they looked and tasted so good! We had her make us some for my daughters 1st bday

quotes.author: denisse.213

quotes.quote: Amazing macarons! There is a good variety of flavors and they all taste spectacular. Brenda is very skilled and an amazing entrepreneur, she can design the perfect macaron for any themed event like she did for my nieces birthday party and at a great price as well. Definitely recommend you to try!
quotes.author: Andy Montejano

quotes.quote: I love supporting local family-owned small businesses. I prefer that to giving large corporations my money. When I tried these macs, I thought they were great. Would order again and continue supporting Brenda.
quotes.author: Santiago M.
